task:
Login to GitHub and explore profile:
1. Use navigate action to go to https://github.com/login
2. Wait 2 seconds for login page to load
3. Fill in the username or email field with {email} from sensitive_data
4. Fill in the password field with {password} from sensitive_data
5. Click Sign in button
6. Wait 5 seconds for the page to load (may need 2FA verification)
7. If you see 2FA prompt, wait for manual verification
8. After successful login, click on your profile icon in the top right
9. Click Your profile in the dropdown menu
10. Wait 3 seconds for profile page to load
11. Scroll down to see pinned repositories
12. Wait 2 seconds
13. Click on the Repositories tab
14. Wait 2 seconds to load repositories list
15. Scroll down to see more repositories
16. Wait 2 seconds
17. Use done action to complete
